simpledb

Class OperatorCardinality

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.OperatorCardinality

  • public class OperatorCardinality
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class, which computes the estimated cardinalities of an operator tree. All methods have been fully provided. No extra codes are required.
